title: Update File

params.name: file_public_id
params.desc: Required. The unique ID assigned to the file in Clubhouse.

params.name: created_at
params.desc: The time/date that the file was uploaded.

params.name: external_id
params.desc: An additional ID that you may wish to assign to the file.

params.name: updated_at
params.desc: The time/date that the file was last updated.

params.name: uploader_id
params.desc: The unique ID assigned to the Member who uploaded the file to Clubhouse.

description: Update File can used to update the properties of a file uploaded to Clubhouse.
